entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sprague
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sprague 1:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -22.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 55 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -29.4°C
Wind: SSW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
